name: Kiran Rawat
intro: Hello, I'm a paragraph. Click here to add your own text and edit me. It’s easy. Just click “Edit Text” or double click me and you can start adding your own content and make changes to the font. Feel free to drag and drop me anywhere you like on your page. I’m a great place for you to write more. Tell a story and let your users get to know you.

projects.title: Understanding Global Poverty Using Visualization, Simon Fraser University
projects.about: Developed a visualization dashboard by utilizing visualization principles to understand the global poverty and various factors related to it.

projects.title: Predicting Stable Portfolios using Machine Learning and Deep Learning
projects.about: Analyzed effect of sentiments of SEC filings on stock prices of S&P500 companies and predicted a stable portfolio based on sentiment scores and OHLC data using neural networks.

projects.title: NYC Taxi Analysis, Simon Fraser University
projects.about: Performed ETL using PySpark and analyzed the dataset to provide the insights on how the taxi vendors in NYC can improve their business. Visualized the results using Kibana framework.
